H0.text: Omar Sharif played the title character in the 1965 film of what 1957 novel by the Russian writer Boris Pasternak. Doctor Zhivago

H1.text: Omar Sharif played the title character in the 1965 film of what 1957 novel by the Russian writer Boris Pasternak. War and Peace

H2.text: Omar Sharif played the title character in the 1965 film of what 1957 novel by the Russian writer Boris Pasternak. Crime and Punishment

H3.text: Omar Sharif played the title character in the 1965 film of what 1957 novel by the Russian writer Boris Pasternak. Zivago

A4.text: The novel Doctor Zhivago ( zhiv-AH-goh; Russian: До́ктор Жива́го [doktər ʐɨˈvaɡə]) is a novel by Russian poet, author and composer Boris Pasternak, first published in 1957 in Italy.

A5.text: The novel Doctor Zhivago was first published in 1957 in Italy.

A6.text: The film stars Omar Sharif in the title role as Yuri Zhivago
